title: Show me English: a visit to the doctor [episode 5]
creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. On the second visit to the doctor, Tina is given the result of her test and is prescribed medication and given advice on the importance of diet and rest. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.
